LongDescription:
Toggle Dark/Light mode from the Control Center on tvOS 13+! 
 Special Thanks to nitoTV for his awesome TVControlCenter tweak! 
 This tweak is open sourced on GitHub! (https://github.com/iKilledAppl3/Svea/) 
 Follow me on Twitter (@iKilledAppl3), 
 Donate via PayPal (https://paypal.me/iKilledAppl3). 
 Support me on Patreon! (https://www.patreon.com/iKilledAppl3)
